Content: @KNOX @Alright there is a bug with showing balances correctly in ZEC upstream, both radix42 and I have noticed it, and it might have come in on recent merge. If you are seeing some issues with getwalletinfo/getbalance not being in sync, could be related

Author: dukeleto#7326
